title: I have a Nexus 5x running 8.1.0 my banking app insists on 8.3.1 which is not offered for my phone
content:
Can I force update to 8.3.1 when not offered on play store or fool app to think I am using correct version.

I appreciate Nexus 5x is not new but this is second banking app which now refuses to run on this phone.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device
